caption.p: (a and b) SEM cross-sectional image and corresponding schematic of the blue LED stack. (c) Work function of electrodes and band gap values of the different materials used in the LED stack, energies vs vacuum. (d) Current density and luminance of the devices with various EL peak positions as a function of voltage. (e and f) EQE of the devices with various EL peak positions as a function of current density and luminance.
